page.title: 17THE A39 TRUNK ROAD
page.content: This is the extremely busy road which passes through our grid area. It connects Bideford and Barnstaple, North Devon's two largest towns. Commuter traffic is heavy. In the tourist season of high summer the road is at its busiest carrying holidaymakers to the resorts along the North Cornwall coast as well as more locally to Westward Ho! 42 bus services from North Devon Red Bus pass through our grid area every day. It is a dangerous road to cross and many of the children come to school with a parent on foot or in a car. Some children from a neighbouring village come along the A39 in a taxi.
